page.title: 12Sports and pastimes
page.content: {Angling} Rod fishing can be difficult if the tide is out, so you may have to hire a boat to go out into the estuary. The fish you will catch are garfish, mackerel, eels and mullet. You need to go out in the middle of the estuary to do net fishing.The bait used by rod fishers is ragworm or lugworm. These can be bought at one of the three shops selling bait in this area. Written by Neil Irvine (10yrs) {Yatching} The Bembridge is the headquarters of the Essex Yatch Club. It is a very big boat which weighs just under 500 tons. It was a survey ship which operated in the North Sea and was brought to Leigh from Liverpool by tug. It is 36 years old and has been in Leigh for 10 years. It has 500 members. Written by Faith Moody (9yrs)
